snippet.title: Call of Duty 4: Survival Mode MW3 Mod RELEASE
snippet.description:
Call of Duty 4 Survival Mode has been expanded with a mod that brings more MW3 elements to it! With plenty of custom NPC models, HUD elements and other various sounds and textures to improve the overall looks and feels of the quality.
👇👇👇Click Read More 👇👇👇

VORTEX MAP WILL BE UPLOADED AS AN ADDON TO THIS MOD WITHIN THE WEEK
AND U-TURN NOT TOO LONG AFTER!

You will need the main mod to play the addon maps.

DOWNLOAD:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/call-of-duty-4-survival-mode-open-source/downloads/survival-mode-mw3-mod-playable-files

Join My Discord Server:
https://discord.gg/Rs68sr4

Call of Duty 4: Survival Mode MW3 Mod Version is a Custom Mission modification
for COD4 that aims on bringing Modern Warfare 3 Survival Mode mechanics to Call of Duty 4. This version of the mode has additional custom assets from the first basic one which was limited to cod4 only assets besides the custom mini map, and now a ton of MW3 assets are added to make the whole survival experience much closer to MW3! Source files for the MW3 Mod assets will be probably ready for upload a few days after this upload on the moddb page of the mode. If there are problems with the custom asset collection the upload will either take longer or in the worst case scenario, not take place at all.

Credits:

A ton of thanks to my very good online friend and programmer helper Scillman.
Most of the features I implemented would either take too much time or never been
completed if it wasn't for his valuable help. Not only in this mode.
But in most of my projects. Also special thanks to Erik and NikolaiBelinski.

Port Credits:

Models exported with Greyhound exporter tool.

COD4 Weapon textures by CFG Factory.

LIGHTWOOD AK-47 - KOENE007 + SPi edit
P90 MAGAZINE HD - ChacalVEVO
HD BLACK UZI - Koene007
MP5 REALISTIC SKIN - Notsafeforwork
DEEK'S G3A4 SKINPACK - DeekCiti + SPi edit
G36C simple - CroWhiteWolf
AK74u - GuMNade
CLEAN M4A1 - Quaddamage
COD4 M249 SAW - 2dSpaceManHobo/SpaceMan
Winchester 1200 by x3vyx
